ai-patthana20.1:0.2_0: the immediately Factors of the Dhamma
ai-patthana20.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana20.1:2.1_0: Enjoying the Teaching arises causes and reasons give rise to cause the reason for the sake of this,

ai-patthana20.1:2.1_2: (Only) without a cause or reason, ( for the sake of) the cause or condition.
ai-patthana20.1:3.1_0: Not cause or reason, without a cause,

ai-patthana20.1:7.1_1: Not cause or reason, without cause or condition.
